title: n8n â€” AI Tool Review
description: n8n is an open-source workflow automation tool with 400+ integrations and native AI agent support for building complex automation workflows. n8n is an open-source workflow automation platform (similar to Zapier but self-hostable) that has added native AI agent capabilities. It supports 400+ app integrations, can run AI workflows that call LLMs, process data, and connect APIs, and is particularly popular for building AI-powered automation pipelines. Free to self-host. Highlights: Open-source and self-hostable. 400+ integrations. Native AI agent capabilities. Visual workflow builder. Free forever for self-hosting.
